author: trawick
msg: WinNT MPM: Fix a broken log message at termination.

author: trawick
msg: tweak error handling when reading the pid file
previously strtol() would look at unitialized
storage, but now the string is terminated where
give user a hint about removing the file if we can't
(somehow I ended up with a truncated httpd.pid on my
own system, leading to these tweaks)

author: bnicholes
msg: Fix the parameter list for the scheme_handler ap_proxy_connect_handler() so that it matches the prototype declared for the scheme_handler hook.
